about.text1: I'm a passionate developer, specializing in full stack and software development, with a wealth of experience spanning 12 years in the professional world. Today, on the strength of this experience and driven by a thirst for new challenges, I'm taking the plunge to become a freelancer. My aim is to put my skills and know-how at your service, to create innovative, tailor-made IT solutions for your company.
about.text2: Unlock your vision. Let's build your app together.

experiences.text1: As a full stack and software developer, I've been on an exciting professional journey over the past 12 years. My career has given me solid expertise in software design and development, as well as in modern web development. My diversified career path, ranging from the supervision of high-precision machines to the creation of web applications based on microservices, bears witness to my ability to adapt and innovate in different fields.
experiences.text2: As a freelancer, I'm determined to use my expertise to add value to your projects and contribute to their success. My aim is to work with you to create tailor-made technological solutions, combining performance, user-friendliness and scalability.
experiences.text3: Please feel free to explore my CV to find out more about my professional background and technical skills. I'm looking forward to working with you on new and exciting challenges. Together, let's create the digital future you've been dreaming of!

validations.email: Value is not a valid email.
